PERSONA:
margaret is a 68-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the united states. she was born and raised in the country and has never lived outside of the u.s. 

margaret completed high school but did not pursue further education. she has never been married and currently lives alone. although she was raised in a religious household, margaret does not actively practice any religion and considers herself unaffiliated with any particular faith.

politically, margaret identifies as a moderate democrat, though she leans slightly conservative on some issues. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously. her annual income falls within the middle-income bracket, ranging from $50,000 to $60,000.

in her daily life, margaret is an avid internet user, frequently going online several times a day. however, she does not engage in any regular volunteer work or community service activities. despite her age, she remains actively engaged with technology and current events.

overall, margaret is a independent-minded woman who values her freedom and privacy. while she holds traditional values in some areas, she also embraces modernity and stays up-to-date with the rapidly changing world around her.
